WorkItem.ClosedComment: I'm closing this one because I fixed the silences part of the issue, and the movement time is as designed.
WorkItem.Description: Adding movement time to boss fights and/or the Lunar Shower talent don't seem to affect calculations at all. Same goes for silence. Stun and Fear seem to be working.

Comments.Message: Extraneous things like Movement are considered Feature Requests as they are "fluff" calcs.

Last time I worked with BossHandler, movement time was tied to melee-range abilities, which is why it doesn't affect Moonkin calculations.  I haven't looked at BossHandler since then and I'm not sure if Jothay ever added in the backend handling for things that require ranged to move.  Not sure about silence.
